channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Karaf
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Karaf

item.title: CVE-2022-22932|2024-08-03T03:28:42.479Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20karaf
item.description: Apache Karaf obr:* commands and run goal on the karaf-maven-plugin have partial path traversal which allows to break out of expected folder. The risk is low as obr:* commands are not very used and the entry is set by user. This has been fixed in revision: https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=karaf.git;h=36a2bc4 https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=karaf.git;h=52b70cf Mitigation: Apache Karaf users should upgrade to 4.2.15 or 4.3.6 or later as soon as possible, or use correct path. JIRA Tickets: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KARAF-7326
